FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for an L2TP group.
The undo description command deletes the description of an L2TP group.
By default, no description is configured for an L2TP group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of an L2TP group.
The value is string of 1 to 80 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-l2tp-backgroup] description this is a backup group
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After running the l2tp-group command to create an L2TP group, you can run the description command to configure a description for the L2TP group to facilitate later query.
The display l2tp-group command displays the description of an L2TP group.
Configuration Impact
If the description command is run more than once, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
